autoInsert.description: If true then insertion is triggered by typing the value of `commentbegin` or `headerbegin`

autoInsertHeader.description: If true then file header insertion is triggered by typing the value of `headerbegin`

autoPrefixOnEnter.description: If true then onEnterRules are added

neverAskTemplate.description: If true then never asks to select default template

paramFormat.description: Format of the @param tag, using ${name} and ${type} fields

returnFormat.description: Format of the @return tag, using ${type} field

allowOptionalArgs.description: If true, allows the '?' prefix for optional function args in @param tag

commentdescription.description: Initial text added to comment description

alwaysMultiline.description: If true then all comments are multiline, else non-functions are single line

params.description: Parameters used to populate '${}' fields in a template. Contains groups of params keyed by language id

*.description: Default params used regardless of which language id is used by the current editor

templates.description: Templates keyed by language id - each template is an array of strings containing text and optional '${}' fields

*.description: Default template used when no language id specified
